data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea mariana (Black spruce) from sample ROMANPLA-281

Exposition S, Slope 3 deg, Geology: Sand, av. Tree height 20 m, Tree cover 45%, Shrub cover 30%, Herb cover 60%, Moss cover 80%, Vegatation type: Feuch. lock. PCMA-Best. m. Pleuroz. Schrekeri, Film number: 823A
